originalText.text:
It was a disappointing experience !!
The management team were not professional at all!!
They gave us an appointment at 10!
We arrived at time but the lady said ‚Äúthe hair stylist is not here and i don‚Äôt know when she will arrive ‚Äú!!!!!
I mean seriously! I had a flight and i had an appointment with them!!!!
They don‚Äôt even try to give us a good customer service or discount or anything!!
They literally said the best we can do is cancel the appointment!

What a service!
The lady on the reception was very rude!
After we done we wanted to pay cash and she said we don‚Äôt take cash!! How would I know if she did say nothing about it!!
She was really rude and not nice at all!!!

originalText.text: Great concept! Walked in, got styled and walked right back out! I have medium length fine hair and was in and out in 15 minutes (just styled not a full blowout). Can‚Äôt wait to come back and get the full experience. Andrea made me party ready and I got so many compliments!

originalText.text:
I've had the pleasure of experiencing the remarkable skills and impeccable service of my hair stylist, Sybil for over 3 years.  With her remarkable attention to detail, kindness, consideration, and expertise in handling textured hair, she has truly become my go-to stylist for my weekly blow outs.

What sets Sybil apart is her willingness to cater to my specific hair care needs along with her exceptional knowledge and skill in working with textured hair. Having struggled to find a stylist who understands the intricacies and challenges of my hair type, I was thrilled to have finally found someone who not only embraced my textured hair but celebrated it. She demonstrates a clear understanding of how to enhance my hair's natural beauty, offering valuable suggestions and expert advice on styling, maintenance, and suitable products.

At every appointment she is consistently considerate, ensuring my comfort and satisfaction. Not only is Sybil highly skilled and knowledgeable, but her kind and compassionate nature truly makes her a pleasure to be around. Her positive energy and genuine care for her clients make each appointment a delightful and rejuvenating experience.

I cannot recommend my hair stylist enough. If you have textured hair and are seeking an attentive, kind, considerate, and knowledgeable professional, look no further.

originalText.text: Thank you Andrea! She was extremely thorough and did an amazing old fashion pin-up look for me! I was in good hands!
